jexer

Class TTextPicture

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.TWidget
      • jexer.TScrollableWidget
        • jexer.TTextPicture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TWidget>, Scrollable, DisplayListener

    public class TTextPicture
extends TScrollableWidget
implements DisplayListener
    TTextPicture displays a color-and-text canvas, also called "ANSI Art" or "ASCII Art".
